titles.title: A bill to limit the number of aliens in each fiscal year who may become lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

bill.summary: 7/23/1987--Introduced. Limits the number of fiscal year alien admissions (other than political asylum entries) to 600,000.
